articles.author: Mat Di Salvo
articles.title: SEC Calls BlackRock, Fidelity Bitcoin ETF Applications Inadequate: WSJ - Decrypt
articles.description: The newspaper reported Friday claims that the top regulator has said the applications "aren’t sufficiently clear and comprehensive" enough.
articles.content: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has said that the wave of spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) applications filed this month are inadequate, according to a Wall Street Journal report… [+1872 chars]

articles.author: Patrick McGee
articles.title: Apple breaks through $3tn valuation again - Financial Times
articles.description: Value has rebounded 45 per cent this year after supply chain problems ease
articles.content:
Apples market valuation surpassed the $3tn mark on Friday as its shares hit a fresh record and the wider tech sector rallied.
Shares in the company rose 1.6 per cent to $192.64 while the tech-focuse… [+3827 chars]
